title: Use
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The use element takes nodes from within the SVG document and duplicates them somewhere else.

usageExamples.title: Basic Example
usageExamples.description: Using the use tag to reference a pre-defined shape.
usageExamples.code:
<svg width='100' height='100'>
  <rect id='myRectangle' width='90' height='90' fill='blue' />
  <use href='#myRectangle' x='5' y='5'/>
</svg>

usageExamples.title: Multiple Use Elements
usageExamples.description: Using multiple use elements to reference the same shape.
usageExamples.code:
<svg width='150' height='150'>
  <rect id='myRectangle' width='70' height='70' fill='green' />
  <use href='#myRectangle' x='5' y='5'/>
  <use href='#myRectangle' x='75' y='75'/>
</svg>
